Ruby (Tiger/?)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): CD/DVD List: Tiger: Ruby (Tiger/?)
By ChetFlavin on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 06:20 am:

Lif. 80
Pow. 170
Int. 115
Spd. 175
Def. 80
Charecteristics-Fast Footwork
Moves-Tiger Charge, Somersault
Gotten off the dvd Best in Show (castlerock and warner brothers lables)

By Cloud Leonheart on Thursday, May 1, 2003 - 07:46 am:

make sure that your Best in Show DVD is NOT the widescreen version. the widescreen just gives you a typical naga.

By carnage on Saturday, December 11, 2004 - 06:22 pm:

i have the wide screen version of this film and it makes ruby. the upc is 085391895121 and its in the all cardboard dvd box that has the plastic flap on the side u open up to get the disk out it has same stats as above

By Dharma Valerkin on Thursday, March 14, 2013 - 12:30 pm:

There are actually two different pressings of Best in Show that come in snap cases (which is what carnage was describing), and only one of them creates Ruby. Here's how you can tell if you're getting the correct one:

There is a *black* DVD Video logo on the front of the case, down in the bottom left corner. The incorrect version will have a white one. If you can see the back of the case, the description will be preceeded by "Si-i-i-t. Sta-a-a-a-a-y. Laugh!" and followed by "It's howlarious!" on the last line.

Hope this helps!
